title: Exquisite Emerald and Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Natural Amethyst. Features a fine Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: This Haaram showcases a regal design featuring a central Emerald centerpiece framed by intricate diamond settings. Accented with delicate Amethyst in a floral design along the necklace, and further embellished with emerald drops. The necklace blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern, sophisticated style.
colors: Predominantly gold with a vibrant contrast of deep green emeralds
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for high-profile social events and family gatherings where you want to make a statement.
description: A stunning fusion of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The high-quality emeralds and diamonds guarantee lasting value and brilliance. This Haaram is a testament to the craftsmanship of Hyderabad's finest artisans, making it a cherished heirloom piece. A unique blend of gemstones creates a striking and unforgettable look. Its versatile design complements both traditional and modern attire.
